name: Mini Tudou RC Crane Toy,50.4 inch Tall 2.4GHz Remote Control Robotic Excavator,Educational Construction Vehicles Toy for Ages 6,7,8,9 Boys or Girls
short_description: 【Little Engineer】 Most little boys have a dream to become an engineer when they are young. The Tower Crane Toy is tailored for this. Perfectly imitate real crane as you see on real construction site. 50.4 inch tall and the tower arm can hold the weight 500g thing.The console can rotate 680 degree and the hook can go up and down by remote control. It also produce realistic lights and sounds to make more realistic playing experience.

【Adjustable Height】The height of the remote control crane toy can be adjust. 3 level detachable bracket for assembly of different heights. It can adjust to 28.8 inch, 39.4 inch and 50.4 inch. Suitable for all children of different heights.

【2.4g rc Technology】Compared with the Wired control model, 2.4G remote control operation has no problem of time delay, and the remote control distance range up to 100 feet with excellent anti-interference. The remote require 2x1.5V AA batteries(not included). The package only include 4.8V 300mAh battery for tower crane. You need to fully charged the battery before playing to provide enough power.

【Educational Develop】This tower crane toy bring no limit fun for kids. It’s great for a child that is a construction or truck enthusiast. Exercise kid’s hand-on ability, imagination, creativity and problem solve skill when kid playing.

【Recommendations and Warnings】This toy is not suitable for children under 6 years.To be used under direct supervision of an adult. Please follow the assembly instructions step by step to install the crane to make it in good condition. The box includes: 1 Crane Main Body, 3 bracket, 1 base mount, 4.8V 300mAh Battery pack, USB cable, 2.4 GHz remote controller, 1 Simulation Wood, 1 Basket.

name: Big Daddy Trucks-Large Sized Friction Powered King Crane which extends to 1 ft Personal Accessories and Toys can be Used on This Truck
short_description: Friction-Powered Action: The friction-powered mechanism eliminates the need for batteries or external power sources. Children can generate movement by pushing the truck forward, and the friction mechanism propels it, providing a dynamic and hands-on experience.

Realistic Design: The toy likely features a realistic design, resembling a large crane truck with a car lift extender. This realism adds authenticity to play, allowing children to engage in imaginative construction and transportation scenarios.

Car Lift Extender: The inclusion of a car lift extender that can reach up to 1 ft adds an extra dimension to play. Children can simulate lifting and transporting vehicles, enhancing their play scenarios and allowing for creative exploration.

Imaginative Play: The realistic design and additional features encourage imaginative play. Children can create scenarios where they act as crane operators, construction workers, or vehicle transporters, fostering creativity and storytelling skills.

Hands-On Interaction: Operating the crane and car lift involves hands-on interaction. Children can manipulate the parts of the toy, load and unload vehicles, and engage in physical play that contributes to fine and gross motor skill development.

Educational Value: Playing with a crane truck toy can have educational benefits. Children may learn about construction, logistics, and the mechanics of cranes. This type of play introduces them to basic concepts related to heavy machinery and transportation.
Visual Appeal: The design and colors of the toy likely contribute to its visual appeal. Eye-catching toys are more likely to capture a child's attention and maintain interest during play.

Role-Playing Opportunities: The crane truck's design and functionality offer role-playing opportunities. Children can take on different roles, such as crane operators, construction managers, or vehicle mechanics, promoting social and imaginative play.

Durability: Many toys with moving parts, like crane trucks, are designed to be durable to withstand active play. Durability is important to ensure the toy can endure the handling and play typical of young children.

Versatility in Play: The toy's design allows for versatile play scenarios. Children can use it in different settings, incorporate it into various play themes, and experiment with different toys or objects to lift and transport.

Whether lifting building blocks or moving objects around the site, this remote-controlled crane is the perfect tool to stimulate your child’s imagination and creativity. Flashing LED lights and engine sound effects make it operate like a real construction vehicle-kids love the thrill, adults appreciate the hobby-grade realism.

【Interactive Lifting & Obstacle Challenges】The remote control forklift’s working lift arm picks up and carries small toys, wooden blocks, or even candy! Create loading games on desks, floors, or DIY obstacle courses. Perfect for kids’ STEM learning (practice precision movements) or adults’ office stress relief.

【Military-Grade Alloy】Made with heavy-duty zinc alloy frame (ASTM F963 certified), this 1:64 model survives toddler throws and adult collector handling. Unlike plastic toys, its scratch-resistant surface stays shiny even after years of play or display. The compact 1.46" height fits perfectly in kids’ hands or adult display cabinets.

【Ignites Creativity Across Ages】Kids imagine running a construction site, moving "materials" while developing problem-solving skills. Adults build miniature dioramas or relive childhood memories with authentic operations. Teachers use it to explain physics concepts like leverage and balance – play becomes learning for everyone!

【Ultimate Gift for 4+ Kids & Adult】Packaged in a sleek gift box with foam protection, it’s ready for birthdays, Christmas, or as a unique desk decor piece. product_description: Product Description The sight of a tower crane belongs to every large construction site - now JAMARA brings this fascinating construction aid as a remote controlled model into the children's room. The construction site highlight for small builders with an impressive height of 1.28 metres, the crane becomes an eye-catcher and provides realistic fun. Thanks to the sturdy mounting platform and the easy plug-in installation, the crane can be set up in a few simple steps. Its solid base plate ensures a firm footing so the crane is ready to use to move loads. With the intuitive 2.4 GHz radio remote control, all functions can be easily controlled. The metal hook safely lifts loads up and down up to 800 grams while the trolley moves back and forth and the crane can rotate endlessly 360 degrees. The LED light in the roof gives the crane an authentic look. The crane impresses with realistic sound effects such as engine sounds and the function of the automatic standby mode. For additional fun is provided by the demo mode, which shows a pre-programmed process and introduces small builders to the possibilities of the crane. All sounds and light effects can be switched off if necessary to ensure a quiet gaming experience. With its adjustable installation height - either 53 cm, 95 cm or 128 cm - the tower crane adapts to any playing situation. The robust metal hook, the reliable slip clutch in case of overload and the replaceable battery underline the high quality and durability of the model. The open, detailed interior of the cabin offers space for toy figures and lets little construction managers live out their imagination. With the Crane XXL 128 tower crane from JAMARA every construction site becomes an adventure. Perfect for small and large builders who want to create great things - in their own home Manufacturer Contact Information JAMARA e.K. ; info@jamara.com
